articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re https://twitter.com/jconorgrogan/status/1635695064692273161

Conor: I dumped a live Ethereum contract into GPT-4. 
In an instant, it highlighted a number of security vulnerabilities and pointed out surface areas where the contract could be exploited. It then verified a specific way I could exploit the contract https://t.co/its5puakUW
articles.title: Re https://twitter.com/jconorgrogan/status/1635695064692273161

https://twitter.com/CathieDWood/status/1635807525164515333

Cathie Wood: They should have been all over the crisis that was looming in plain sight: asset and liability duration mismatches as short rates soared 19-fold in less than a year and deposits in the banking system were falling on a year-over-year basis for the first time since the 1920s!

articles.description:
铁鱼延期了

Odaily@ChinaCryptoNews: 🎣Iron Fish主网上线推迟至4月20日，KYC截止日期延长至4月14日
隐私网络Iron Fish宣布由于发现了一个需要修复的错误，将原定于3月14日的主网上线推迟至4月20日，用户将有更多时间完成KYC
从今天开始，兑换门户对所有参与者开放，新KYC截止日期是4月14日，所有符合条件的测试网用户将于4月21日获得空投
articles.title: 铁鱼延期了

Jeremy Allaire: Indeed, the Payment Stablecoin Act, which remains a very active pursuit for Congress, would enshrine in law a regime where stabelcoin funds would be held with cash at the Fed and short-term T-Bills.  We need this law now more than ever if we want a truly safe financial system.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Balaji
Thinking this through, it’s the type of government-caused crisis that could lead to a CBDC.
Because I don’t know how businesses could practically operate with only a $250k max in each account.
They’d have to keep buying and selling T-bills. Instead they’d want to somehow send… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1634553488700223488

Naval: If businesses lose money on deposit, then every business in the country will move all cash above $250K into Treasuries and we’ll have a system-wide bank run at Twitter speed. 
They’ll tell their banker, “the only counterparty I want is the US Treasury.”

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re 3) Novel Innovations.
Quantum Random Number Generation: Unlike off-chain betting platforms, Arc utilizes QRNG to enable first provably fair and transparent betting platform.
ALP: Inspired by $GMX's GLP before it, ALP enables LPs to earn from Arc's remarkably stable house edge.

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re 2) Execution.
A Grand Vision is nothing w/o execution.
While the project is young, the Arcadeum team is rolling out products at a fast clip:
- Roulette
- Dice
- Wheel
- Slide
- Limbo
- RPS
- Coin flip
- Keno
W/ many more to come, including 1000x lev trades later this month...

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re 1) Grand Vision.
Per the project's docs, Arcadeum's mission is twofold:
(1) Create the most transparent, fair, and ethical online betting platform in the world.
(2) Create the Uniswap of on-chain betting.
Talk about aiming high!
Btw the online gaming market Is >$60B...
